channel.title: Attacking while running
channel.description:
Is there a way to make it so when you are in the wild and you are attacking someone and they run you can still attack them while they are running.
For some reason you need to be still to attack.
Thanks is someone can help
Thanks !@

item.title: Attacking while running
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You need to add following and attack following. The only differences are that for attack following you canâ€™t let the two players face each other diagonally.
